title: Teaching Method Practical Skills Enhancement: Cognitive Load Theory-Based Workshop Design for Medical Educators

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Medical Terminology and Clinical Practice Experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Participants can apply the three elements of Cognitive Load Theory (intrinsic, extraneous, and germane load) to actual medical education scenarios.
Participants can explain at least three complexity adjustment strategies when designing medical education materials tailored to learners' proficiency levels.
Participants can plan effective medical education activities in smartphone-based environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
